Parameter.name: Purpose
Parameter.value: Input file for the ASCEM-F-Area Phase II Demo

Parameter.name: max chemistry to transport timestep ratio
pseudo time integrator initialize with darcy
pseudo time integrator clipping saturation value
pseudo time integrator time integration method
pseudo time integrator error control options
pseudo time integrator picard convergence tolerance
pseudo time integrator picard maximum number of iterations
Component Solutes
Parameter.value: {H+, Al+++, Ca++, Cl-, Fe+++, CO2(aq), K+, Mg++, Na+, SiO2(aq), SO4--, Tritium, NO3-, UO2++}

Parameter.name: Minerals
Parameter.value: {Quartz, Goethite, Kaolinite, Schoepite, Gibbsite, Jurbanite, Basaluminite, Opal}

Parameter.name: Time Macro
Parameter.value: {Active Basin, Plume evolution: every year, Plume evolution: every five years}
